articles.title: 8th Congress of KCU Held in Presence of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
8th Congress of KCU Held in Presence of Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- The 8th Congress of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) took place with splendor at the April 25 House of Culture on Tuesday.
					 Attending the congress were exemplary delegates selected from KCU organizations across the country. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were officials in charge of schoolchildren's life and officials concerned of education for school youth and children.
					
					 Respected Marshal Kim Jong Un appeared on the tribune of honor of the congress hall together with delegates.
					
					 A KCU member put a red tie around his neck. 
					
					 KCU delegates presented a floral basket to him.
					
					 He congratulated the enthusiastically cheering delegates and extended warm greetings to them.
					
					 Taking the tribune of honor were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Ri Il Hwan, department director of the C.C., WPK, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, officials of the youth league and officials concerned and KCU delegates who set an example in study and organizational life.
					
					 The following agenda items were put up for discussion: 
					
					1. On fully preparing KCU members to be able revolutionary talents equipped with knowledge, morality and strong physique and children revolutionaries, remaining boundlessly faithful to respected Marshal Kim Jong Un
					
					 2. On revision of the KCU rules
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, made a report on the first agenda item.
					
					 He said the victorious and glorious course of the KCU is associated with the deep loving care of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who brought up the KCU members to be true sons and daughters faithful to the party and the country. 
					
					 In the past four years since the 7th Congress of the KCU its organizations have achieved successes in the drive to carry out the important tasks set forth by Kim Jong Un in his congratulatory speech at the joint national meeting of the KCU organizations held in celebration of the 66th anniversary of its founding and his instructions for strengthening the KCU work, the reporter noted.
					
					 He called upon all the KCU members to grow up to be pillars of prosperous Korea remaining boundlessly loyal to Marshal Kim Jong Un, flying the immortal flags of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before the KCU flag. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the congress.
					
					 The speakers expressed their resolutions to prepare themselves to be true children revolutionaries steadfastly carrying on the march toward Mt Paektu by doing well study, organizational life, socio-political activities and good-conduct movement, bearing in mind their honor and pleasure of taking part in the 8th Congress of the KCU in the presence of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un heard with keen interest the speeches of delegates, warmly applauding them.
					
					 A decision on the first agenda item was adopted.
					
					 The second agenda item was discussed and decided. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un made a speech at the congress.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Makes Speech at 8th Congress of KCU
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Makes Speech at 8th Congress of KCU
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- Respected Marshal Kim Jong Un made a speech at the 8th Congress of the Korean Children's Union (KCU).
					 Kim Jong Un in his speech extended congratulations to the KCU members across the country on June 6, their holiday, with blessings of all the people across the country.
					
					 He said that the congress marks a significant occasion in developing the KCU into the children's union of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il whose name shines forever.
					
					 The KCU is the Juche-oriented children's revolutionary organization founded and trained by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and a mass political organization of the Korean children who are firmly preparing themselves to be the successors to revolution, heirs to the Party and the youth league, he noted.
					
					 He pointed out that the glorious and proud history covered by the KCU is the one of the brilliant victory of the idea and leadership of the Juche-oriented children's movement of the Generalissimos who valued and loved the KCU members dearest and devoted their all to the young generation.
					
					 He said that over the past four years since the 7th Congress of the KCU, its organizations and millions of members across the country have brilliantly carried out the pledges they made before its flag, keeping pace with the gigantic advance of the country making a leaping forward.
					
					 He noted that the future of the Juche revolution and Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea is rosy and bright as there is the KCU which is stoutly carrying forward the soul of Paektu.
					
					 He pointed out that it is the basic task facing the KCU organizations at present to develop it into the children's union of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and children's organization of the Workers' Party of Korea and prepare all its members to be the true sons and daughters and children revolutionaries of the socialist country.
					
					 The KCU members should become ardent children revolutionaries who know the greatness of the Party and the leader and preciousness of the country and devote everything to the country and the revolution, he said, and went on:
					
					 The KCU members should always bear in mind the great benevolence of the great Generalissimos who provided the happiest life in the world and hold them as the eternal sun of Juche with loyalty.
					
					 They should always think and lead a life as intended by the Workers' Party of Korea everywhere, bearing in mind that the red tie of the KCU is a part of the flag of the Party and their dream and ideal can come true under the flag of the Party.
					
					 They should grow up to be ardent revolutionaries and heroes by learning from the noble examples of the revolutionary forerunners and heroes.
					
					 The basic revolutionary task facing the KCU members is to prepare themselves to be able revolutionary talents equipped with knowledge, morality and strong physique and pillars for building a socialist power.
					
					 They should bear in mind Kim Jong Il's patriotism and become children patriots who value all wealth on this land provided by the revolutionary forerunners with their blood and sweat and tend a tree and a blade of grass with their own hands, not beloved sons and daughters who enjoy happiness only.
					
					 The KCU members should foster strong sense of organization and discipline through its organizational life and glorify the honor of being members of the glorious children's union of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his speech expressed the firm belief that all the KCU members will straightly and vigorously advance following the Party while flying high the flag of the KCU and thus wonderfully repay the expectation of the WPK and all the people.

articles.title: Birthday Party of KCU Congress Delegates Held
articles.content:
Birthday Party of KCU Congress Delegates Held
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- A birthday party for delegates to the 8th Congress of the Korean Children's Union was given at the April 25 Hotel Tuesday.
					 The delegates who greet their birthdays during the congress were present there.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, said respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un made sure that the 8th Congress of the KCU and a birthday party for delegates to the congress were held despite his busy work. He attended the congress to congratulate the KCU delegates.
					
					 This reflects the warmest loving care shown by Kim Jong Un for the children, he added.
					
					 He called on the delegates to always remember the honor and happiness today and firmly prepare themselves to be pillars of strong Korea.
					
					 The participants extended deep thanks to Kim Jong Un for his boundless loving care.

articles.title: Schoolchildren in DPRK Celebrates 71st Founding Anniversary of KCU
articles.content:
Schoolchildren in DPRK Celebrates 71st Founding Anniversary of KCU
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- Members of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) across the country celebrated the 71st founding anniversary of the KCU.
					 They visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and mosaics depicting their smiling images and laid floral baskets and bouquets before them before paying tribute to them.
					
					 Provincial, city and county joint meetings of KCU organizations took place.
					
					 Performances were given by schoolchildren in various places including Phyongsong Schoolchildren's Palace, Hamhung Plaza and Sinuiju Primary School for Orphans.
					
					 Sports and amusement games of schoolchildren took place at primary schools, junior middle schools and camps throughout the country.
					
					 Schoolchildren also spent their holiday at the Natural History Museum, the Central Zoo and other recreation grounds.

articles.title: Loving Care for Younger Generation
articles.content:
Loving Care for Younger Generation
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- Schoolchildren in the DPRK are significantly greeting the 71st anniversary of the Korean Children's Union (June 6, 1946) and its 8th Congress.
					 On this occasion, all the people in the country are recalling with deep emotion the immortal feats performed by peerlessly great men in making the unique history of love for younger generation and future and opening up the bright vista to the homeland.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung dedicated 20 yuan, a token of his mother's love for him, to making clothes for members of the Children's Corps during the anti-Japanese armed struggle, raised the issue of pencil production as the first item on the agenda of the Provisional People's Committee of North Korea after the country's liberation from Japan's colonial rule and took a measure to build a schoolchildren's palace in the most excellent location of Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					
					 Even in the last moments of his great life, the President had a photo session with the participants in the 5th Congress of the Korean Children's Union (KCU).
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il in his lifetime took a number of measures for schoolchildren like building a branch school for few children in a remote village, always saying that careless education of children would be resulted in slowing the advance of the homeland. Thanks to his loving care, soya milk continued to be supplied to children even in the period of the Arduous March.
					
					 Now, the loving care for children shown by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is being creditably carried forward by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un took part in the celebrations of the 66th birth anniversary of the KCU and enjoyed an art performance with its participants. He also attended the 7th Congress of the KCU and had a photo taken with delegates to the congress.
					
					 He took measures to supply new school uniforms, schoolbags and Mindulle notebooks to all children and build excellent primary and middle schools for orphans across the country. When the northern part of Hamgyong Province in the country was heavily hit by flood last year, he saw to it that schoolchildren in the area enjoy camping during the campaign for its restoration.
					
					 Under his warm loving care, schoolchildren in the DPRK are being brought up to be pillars supporting Juche Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Congratulates 8th Congress of KCU
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Congratulates 8th Congress of KCU
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday runs an editorial in congratulation of the 8th Congress of the Korean Children's Union (KCU).
					 Now all the people of the DPRK extend warm congratulations to the 8th Congress of the KCU and look forward the rosy future of Juche Korea at the bright picture of schoolchildren coming into full bloom under the warm care of the sun, the editorial says, and continues:
					
					 The proud course of the KCU is associated with the leadership exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who devoted their restless efforts to developing the Juche-oriented children's movement.
					
					 The President provided a precious tradition of the Korean children's movement in the flames of the anti-Japanese struggle and established the most popular universal free education system, the first time in the world. He saw to it that schoolchildren were provided with new school uniforms according to the season and posed for a souvenir picture with the participants in the 5th Congress of the KCU in the last period of his life, wishing their rosy future.
					
					 If one slows down one step in the work of bringing up the younger generation, the country's advance is slow ten steps, and calculation should not be given priority to the work for schoolchildren. This was the noble intention of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Thanks to the benevolent care of the great leaders who protected schoolchildren from rainstorm and dark clouds of war as their close teachers and tender-hearted fathers all the times, laughs and happy songs resounded forth on this land even during the periods of difficulties and ordeals and the large contingent of the heirs to the cause of the Juche revolution could grow staunchly.
					
					 The editorial calls upon all the members of the KCU to fully prepare themselves to be true sons and daughters of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and heroes of prosperous Korea, bearing in mind the glory and honor of being members of the glorious children's union of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Greetings to King of Sweden
articles.content:
Greetings to King of Sweden
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Carl â…©VI Gustaf, king of Sweden, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message wished for the prosperity of Sweden.

articles.title: Delegation of DPRK Foreign Ministry Visits Russia
articles.content:
Delegation of DPRK Foreign Ministry Visits Russia
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK led by O Sung Ho, director-general of the European Department 1 of the Foreign Ministry, visited Moscow on Monday at the invitation of the Foreign Ministry of Russia.
					 The delegation had a consultation with Andrei Borisovich Kulik, director of the Department 1 for Asian Affairs of the Russian Foreign Ministry.
					
					 They exchanged views on the tense situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula and deeply discussed the issues arising in stably developing the bilateral ties true to the idea of the agreements and joint documents signed at summits of the two countries.
					
					 Then the 2017-2018 plan for exchange was concluded between the foreign ministries of the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
					
					 It was signed by Kim Hyong Jun, DPRK ambassador to Russia, and Igor Morgulov, vice foreign minister of Russia.
					
					 The two sides decided to ensure frequent mutual visits and close contacts and intensify cooperation according to the plan and thus accelerate the development of the overall bilateral relations.

articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Denounces U.S. for Withdrawing from Paris Agreement
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Denounces U.S. for Withdrawing from Paris Agreement
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA on June 6 as regards the Trump administration's announcement to withdraw from the Paris Agreement (on climate change):
					 On June 1, Trump officially announced the U.S. withdrawal from the Paris Agreement asserting that the agreement is not fair to the U.S. and it brings disadvantages to the American people.
					
					 Global warming is one of the gravest challenges the humankind is facing today and the Paris Agreement that called for nationally determined contribution to the reduction of GHG emission is the outcome of decades long efforts to mitigate it.
					
					 The U.S. announcement to withdraw from the Paris Agreement is inviting strong denunciation and criticism from world-wide.
					
					 The "America First Policy" advocated by Trump led to the withdrawal from the Paris Agreement. This is the height of egoism and moral vacuum seeking only their own well-being even at the cost of the entire planet and, at the same time, a short-sighted and silly decision ignorant of the fact that the protection of the global environment is in their own interests.
					
					 The selfish act of the U.S. does not only have grave consequences for the international efforts to protect the environment, but poses great danger to other areas as well. 
					
					 The U.S. attitude towards the nuclear issue in the Korean peninsula is the typical example.
					
					 The hostile policy of the U.S. against the DPRK has grown so unreasonable and reckless today that they are even coercing other countries to sacrifice their relations with the DPRK under the pretext of ensuring the U.S security.
					
					 It is high time the world stopped pondering over the dangerous ideological trend which is surfacing in the U.S. with the emergence of the Trump administration, but raised alarm and stayed highly vigilant about it.
					
					 Whoever chooses to blindly follow the Trump administration overpowered by its bravado should be fully aware that the judgment of history shall take them all as one.

articles.title: Officials of Women's Union Make Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt Paektu
articles.content:
Officials of Women's Union Make Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt Paektu
 Samjiyon, June 6 (KCNA) -- Officials of the women's union from across the country made a study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt Paektu from June 1 to 6 on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of the victorious Pochonbo battle commanded by President Kim Il Sung.
					 Before the study tour, they laid bouquets and flowers before the statue of President Kim Il Sung holding at the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo before paying tribute to them.
					
					 Upon arriving at Pochonbo, the members of the expedition group were briefed about it before the statue of the President and looked round the command post of the Pochonbo battle, the post office, the sub-county office, the fire station and other places.
					
					 After climbing Mt Paektu, they vowed to demonstrate revolutionary stamina as Korean women in the all-out general offensive for the Conference of Mallima Frontrunners, reciting the long epic "Mt Paektu" and other poems.
					
					 Visiting the birthplace of leader Kim Jong Il in the Paektusan Secret Camp, they recollected his revolutionary history.
					
					 They went round the Samjiyon Grand Monument, the groups of subsidiary theme sculptures and the revolutionary relics on the shore of Lake Samji.
					
					 After visiting the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station, they looked round the Sinsadong Revolutionary Battle Site where the President did political work among the people, and the Monument to the Victorious Battle in the Musan Area.
					
					 At the Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site, they grasped the exploits of Kim Jong Il who paved the way for the study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt Paektu and made the revolutionary traditions of Mt Paektu shine as eternal foundation of the Party and the revolution.
					
					 At the Chongbong and Konchang bivouacs, they looked round the site of headquarters, the site of campfire and slogan-bearing trees.
					
					 During their study tour, they did diverse political and cultural work.

articles.title: Minju Joson Denounces U.S. for Intensifying Military Threat to DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Denounces U.S. for Intensifying Military Threat to DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- Now the U.S. is additionally dispatching Nimitz nuclear carrier task force together with Carl Vinson and Ronald Reagan to the waters off the Korean peninsula and thus seeking to deploy three nuclear carrier task forces in the waters.
					 Military experts estimated that all signs show the U.S. military attack on the DPRK is at hand. And they analyzed that the U.S. talk about the diplomatic settlement of the Korean issue is little short of the smoke-screen tactics for launching military strike at the DPRK, in fact.
					
					 Minju Joson in a commentary Tuesday says this goes to prove that the U.S. remains unchanged in its sinister design for stifling the DPRK by force and the U.S. decided to carry out a fresh military adventure in Korea.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 As known, the U.S. advanced the policy towards the DPRK so-called "4-point keynote" and is advertising that it wants the settlement of the nuclear issue through dialogue. This is aimed to stabbing a sword into the DPRK after relaxing it.
					
					 The U.S. has used this method before the military attack on other countries, and the DPRK has witnessed this more than once. The U.S. talk about "dialogue" and "peace" is no more than a prelude of aggression.
					
					 Now that it is as clear as noonday that the U.S. is mulling settling the nuclear issue with military method, the DPRK will not stop even a moment the struggle for producing more Juche weapons of Korean style to wipe out the U.S. on the earth and for arming itself with them.

articles.title: North-South Declarations Should Be Respected and Implemented: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
North-South Declarations Should Be Respected and Implemented: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- The basic way for removing the root cause of the catastrophic north-south relations and paving a wide avenue to peace and reunification is to respect and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration adopted at the two north-south summits are the great programmes for independent reunification common to the nation which should be consistently adhered to for the development of the north-south relations and settlement of the reunification issue.
					
					 In order to achieve the aspiration and wishes of the Koreans for peace and reunification, it is necessary to respect and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, first of all.
					
					 The only way of overcoming the difficulties facing the nation and hastening the national reunification is to respect and consistently implement the north-south declarations.
					
					 Turning back away from implementing the north-south declarations and seeking others while talking about improved north-south relations cannot be said an act of sincerely wishing reunification.
					
					 If one ignores and hesitates to implement the north-south declarations at the responsible and important period as now, he can not enjoy support of the public mindset and evade curses and condemnation from all the Koreans.

articles.title: Papers Denounce S. Korean Puppet Conservative Group for Opposing Abolition of "State-compiled Textbooks"
articles.content:
Papers Denounce S. Korean Puppet Conservative Group for Opposing Abolition of "State-compiled Textbooks"
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the south Korean puppet Ministry of Education officially announced that it would enforce the system of issuing history textbooks of middle and high schools by changing it into the original "system of screening textbooks" from the "state-compiled textbooks system". So, the "state-compiled history textbooks" by traitor Park Geun Hye to praise her pro-U.S., pro-Japanese history and "yusin" dictatorship rule are to be thrown into the dustbin of history.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary says this is the result of the south Korean people's dynamic struggle to make a clean sweep of all Park's evils against democracy.
					
					 Great irony is the fact that Park and puppet conservative remnants driven into a ruin are making desperate efforts to put a brake in the wheel of the moves for abolishing the "state-compiled history textbooks", the leftover of Park, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet conservative group is doggedly opposed to the abolition of the "state-compiled history textbooks". It is, in essence, another history coup to revive the fascist dictatorship system.
					
					 The south Korean people will never pardon the reckless moves of the wicked conservatives desperately running amuck to turn back the wheel of history while swimming against the trend of the times.
					
					 The puppet conservative group would be well advised to be dead before making desperate efforts for getting rid of the ruin.
					
					 Minju Joson in a commentary says it is clear that the conservative group would be further split than now when the "state-compiled history textbooks" are abolished. That's why the conservatives including the "Liberal Korea Party" are persistently opposed to the "abolition of the Park Geun Hye's evils" such as the abolition of the "state-compiled history textbooks," it concludes.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Puppet Defense Minister's Invective against DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Puppet Defense Minister's Invective against DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- Han Min Gu, puppet minister of Defense of south Korea, held a confab with his U.S. master, where he called the DPRK's step for bolstering the nuclear deterrent for self-defence a "provocation," talking about "isolation" and "hardship."
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary terms this poor grumbling of the pitiful colonial mercenaries prolonging his remaining days with the backing of outsiders and the hysteric fit of those stunned by the military power of the DPRK.
					
					 The warmongers of the south Korean military like Han Min Gu are crying out for "punishing" the DPRK, taking issue with its step for bolstering the nuclear deterrent for self-defence. It is, indeed, a burlesque that makes even a cat laugh, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 As for military equipment of the south Korean puppet army like radar, they are all second-handed ones the majority of which were offered by the U.S. and are little short of scrap iron. Grafts of the brass hats massively brought no-guarantee weapon systems and defective equipment to the puppet army.
					
					 Soldiers of the puppet army are wishing that a war would not break out during their service. Such an army with poor hardware and without OPECON is often bluffing, crying out for not "pardoning the provocation of the north" and inflicting "resolute punishment."
					
					 This, indeed, provokes side-splitting laughter.

articles.title: Bird Flu Spreads in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Spreads in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- Bird flu which occurred in Kunsan City, North Jolla Province, south Korea is rapidly spreading to several regions, according to reports of south Korean media.
					 At present, it occurred at the stock farms in Phaju City, Kyonggi Province, Kijang County, Pusan City and Jeju Province that purchased chickens from the chicken farms in Kunsan City.
					
					 Thousands of chickens and ducks were culled in the regions where the bird flue occurred.

articles.title: Drama on Massacre of Koreans Put on Stage in Japan
articles.content:
Drama on Massacre of Koreans Put on Stage in Japan
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- A drama showing the massacre of Koreans by the Japanese imperialists in the wake of the great Kanto earthquake was put on the stage of a theater in Yokohama, Kanagawa Prefecture of Japan on June 3, according to the south Korean Hangyore.
					 The drama, based on historical facts, showed the brutal massacre of Koreans by the Japanese imperialists with the quake as a momentum.
					
					 The Japanese who directed the drama said he produced it by consulting the diary of his father and historical records in order to let the new generation of Japan know well about the massacre of Koreans in the wake of the great Kanto earthquake.

articles.title: Efectuado el VIII Congreso de la ONC
articles.content:
Efectuado el VIII Congreso de la ONC
Pyongyang, 6 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar con solemnidad el dia 6 el VIII Congreso de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea (ONC) en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril.
					En la ocasion participaron los delegados ejemplares de la ONC seleccionados en las entidades de la ONC en distintas localidades del pais.
					
					Y fueron invitadas al conclave los funcionarios de trabajo con los ninos escolares y del sector relacionado con la educacion de jovenes y ninos.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un salio a la tribuna del congreso junto con los delegados infantiles.
					
					Un miembro de la ONC le puso la panoleta roja.
					
					Los delegados de la ONC le entregaron un cesto de flores.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente felicito a los delegados de la ONC que le dan ardientes aclamaciones y les envio el saludo cordial a todos los participantes.
					
					Ocuparon la presidencia Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y del CC del PTC, Choe Thae Bok, miembro del BP y vicepresidente del CC del PTC, Ri Il Hwan, jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Sung Du, presidente del Comite de Educacion, los funcionarios de la union juvenil y del dominio interesado, los delegados de la ONC quienes destacaron en el estudio y la vida organizativa.
					
					En el conclave fueron abordados los puntos de la agenda:
					
					1. Para preparar firmemente a los integrantes de la ONC como competentes talentosos y revolucionarios infantiles, infinitamente fieles al Mariscal Kim Jong Un y dotados de ricos conocimientos, nobles virtudes y buena salud.
					
					2. Sobre la enmienda de los estatutos de la ONC.
					
					En su informe sobre el primer punto de la agenda, Jon Yong Nam, primer secretario del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista, senalo que en la trayectoria de la ONC caracterizada de la victoria y gloria estan impregnados de los cuidados generosos del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il quienes formaron a los miembros de la ONC como verdaderos hijos e hijas infinitamente fieles al partido y a la patria.
					
					Durante 4 anos pasados posteriores al VII Congreso de la ONC, las unidades de la ONC lograron exitos en los trabajos por materializar las tareas programaticas presentadas en el mensaje de felicitacion del Maximo Dirigente pronunciado en el acto nacional de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea en felicitacion al 66o aniversario de la fundacion de la ONC y sus instrucciones dadas para fortalecer la labor de la ONC, puntualizo.
					
					Asevero que todos los integrantes de la ONC deben prepararse firmemente como fidedignos trabajadores de la Corea prospera, infinitamente fieles al Maximo Dirigente, flameando en la delantera de la bandera de la ONC las imperecederas banderas con imagenes del Presidente y el Dirigente.
					
					Hubo intervenciones en la ocasion.
					
					Los oradores expusieron sus determinaciones de prepararse como verdaderos revolucionarios infantiles que continuan la marcha iniciada en el monte Paektu al realizar mas perfectamente el estudio y la vida organizativa, las actividades socio-politicas y los trabajos utiles conservando la gloria y alegria de haber participado en el significativo VIII Congreso de la ONC efectuado con la presencia del Maximo Dirigente. 
					
					El Maximo Dirigente escucho atentamente los discursos de los delegados y les dio los calurosos aplausos. 
					
					Quedo adoptada la resolucion sobre la primera agenda. 
					
					Seguidamente, se discutio y se aprobo la segunda agenda "Sobre la enmienda de los estatutos de la ONC".
					
					El Maximo Dirigente pronuncio el discurso en el congreso.

articles.title: Discurso de Kim Jong Un pronunciado en el VIII Congreso de la ONC
articles.content:
Discurso de Kim Jong Un pronunciado en el VIII Congreso de la ONC
Pyongyang, 6 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un hizo el dia 6 un discurso en el VIII Congreso de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea (ONC).
					Con motivo del 6 de junio, fiesta de los miembros de la ONC, el Mariscal dio felicitaciones a todos estos del pais reflejando la bendicion de todo el pueblo y prosiguio:
					
					El presente congreso sirve del significativo motivo en el trabajo de fortalecer la ONC como eterna organizacion de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					La ONC es la autoctona organizacion revolucionaria de ninos fundada y dirigida con mucho carino por los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y la organizacion politica masiva de los ninos coreanos que se preparan firmemente como sucesores de la revolucion y continuadores del partido y la union juvenil.
					
					La gloriosa y orgullosa historia de la ONC esta llena de brillantes triunfos de la idea y direccion sobre el autoctono movimiento de ninos de esos grandes lideres quienes amaron mucho a los integrantes de la ONC y dedicaron todo lo suyo a los miembros de la nueva generacion.
					
					Durante los 4 anos posteriores al VII Congreso, las unidades de la ONC de todo el pais y millones de sus integrantes han venido practicando con exito su juramento hecho ante la bandera de la ONC junto con el gran avance de la patria.
					
					Gracias a contar con la ONC que continua firmemente el alma del monte Paektu es infinitamente claro e iluminante el futuro de la revolucion coreana, la nacion de Kim Il Sung y Corea de Kim Jong Il. 
					
					La mision principal que le incumbe actualmente a las unidades de la ONC es fortalecerla como eterna organizacion infantil de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y del PTC y formar a todos los integrantes de la ONC como verdaderos hijos e hijas y revolucionarios infantiles de la patria socialista.
					
					Los miembros de la ONC deben ser fervientes revolucionarios infantiles que saben la grandeza del partido y el lider y la importancia de la patria y dedican todo lo suyo por esta y la revolucion. 
					
					Deben guardar siempre en la profundidad del corazon la gran benevolencia de los grandes Generalisimos quienes prepararon una vida dichosa sin parangon en el mundo y enaltecerles con fidelidad como eterno sol del Juche. 
					
					Tienen que pensar y vivir siempre de acuerdo con el proposito del PTC teniendo bien presente que la panoleta roja de la ONC es una parte de la bandera del PTC y que el sueno y el ideal de los miembros de la ONC podran practicarse solo bajo la bandera del PTC. 
					
					Todos los integrantes de la ONC deben formarse como fervientes revolucionarios y heroes al asimilar los nobles ejemplos de los martires revolucionarios y heroes. 
					
					La tarea revolucionaria fundamental que se presenta ante los miembros de la ONC es prepararse como competentes talentosos revolucionarios dotados de ricos conocimientos, nobles virtudes y buena salud y dignos trabajadores de la construccion de potencia socialista.  
					
					No deben ser ninos mimados que gocen unicamente de la felicidad, sino patriotas infantiles que conserven el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il, aprecien todos los patrimonios de esta tierra preparados por los martires revolucionarios dedicando su sangre y sudor y cultiven con sus propias manos un arbol y una mata de hierba.  
					
					A traves de la vida organizativa de la ONC, los integrantes de la ONC deben cultivar los caracteres organizativo y disciplinario y glorificar el honor del miembro de la gloriosa organizacion de ninos de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Al finalizar, el Maximo Dirigente expuso su conviccion de que todos los miembros de la ONC responderan excelentemente a la esperanza del partido y todo el pueblo al marchar rectamente con pasos firmes bajo la guia del partido enarbolando la bandera de la ONC.

articles.title: Delegacion de trabajo del MINREX visita a Rusia
articles.content:
Delegacion de trabajo del MINREX visita a Rusia
Pyongyang, 6 de junio (ACNC) -- La delegacion de trabajo del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, encabezada por el director O Sung Ho, visito el dia 5 a Moscu cumplimentando la invitacion del MINREX de Rusia.
					 La delegacion sostuvo negociaciones con el titular de la Direccion 1 de Asia del MINREX de Rusia, Andrei Borisovich Kulik.
					
					 En la ocasion hubo intercambio de opiniones relativas a la tensa situacion dada en la Peninsula Coreana y quedaron debatidos francamente los problemas para desarrollar de manera estable las relaciones bilaterales conforme a los acuerdos y documentos conjuntos logrados en las cumbres de ambos paises.
					
					  Ademas, fue suscrito el plan de intercambio para el periodo 2017-2018 entre las cancillerias de la RPDC y la Federacion Rusa.
					
					  Lo firmaron el embajador coreano en Rusia, Kim Hyong Jun, y el viceministro ruso de Relaciones Exteriores, Morgulov.
					
					  Ambas partes acordaron dar buen impulso al desarrollo de las relaciones bilaterales en su conjunto al dinamizar el viaje reciproco y la cooperacion y estrechar los contactos en virtud del plan mencionado.

articles.title: Cancilleria coreana condena a EE.UU. que declaro la salida del Acuerdo de Paris
articles.content:
Cancilleria coreana condena a EE.UU. que declaro la salida del Acuerdo de Paris
Pyongyang, 6 de junio (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada en relacion con que la administracion Trump declaro la retirada del Acuerdo de Paris (sobre el cambio climatico), el vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio hoy la siguiente respuesta:
					El dia primero, Trump declaro oficialmente que EE.UU. se retira del acuerdo citado diciendo que este pacto es injusto para su pais y causa danos a los estadounidenses. 
					
					El calentamiento del globo terraqueo es uno de los graves desafios con que afronta hoy dia la humanidad. Por eso, ya comenzaron desde hace decenios los esfuerzos por prevenirlo. Como su resultado, quedo aprobado el Acuerdo de Paris para reducir la cantidad de emision de gas carbonico en cada pais.
					
					La presente declaracion de Trump produce la gran condena y censura a EE.UU. en la palestra internacional.
					
					La "prioridad a EE.UU." que preconiza Trump trajo la retirada del Acuerdo de Paris, lo cual deviene el climax del egoismo y la bajeza moral que persigue solo su vida rica en lugar de sacrificar a todo el mundo. 
					
					Ademas, constituye un acto de miope y absurdo de no entender la verdad de que la proteccion del medioambiente de la Tierra es util tambien para el pais americano. 
					
					El acto egoista de EE.UU. ejerce una grave influencia a los empenos internacionales por proteger el ambiente y causa gran peligrosidad a otros sectores. 
					
					Su ejemplo mas representativo es la actitud de EE.UU. en cuanto al problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Insatisfecho con la politica hostil anti-RPDC, EE.UU. impone a otros paises suspender las relaciones con la RPDC para la seguridad de su pais, lo que es un acto sumamente injusto y peligroso.
					
					El mundo no debe vacilar mas, sino elevar la vigilancia ante la peligrosa corriente ideologica que se presenta en el suelo norteamericano junto con la aparicion de la administracion Trump. 
					
					Y todos los paises deben tener bien presente que si siguen actuando ciegamente temidos por la fanfarronada de la banda de Trump se pondran en la misma posicion igual con EE.UU, cuando este se presente ante el tribunal de la historia.
